attributes.review: Do NOT download this app. I downloaded it to look at our sexy orange man, and when I did, it made my phone glitch so bad. I can barely even type this out it’s so bad please, if you value your cell phone, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it would be a bunch of lesbian porn. I tried getting out of it but whenever I closed the app I could still hear loud moans. This resulted in me having ptsd.
attributes.title: Porn

attributes.review: This was the worst app. It was not about “keeping America great”. The only way we can keep America great is if we can make America great and this app and the person behind it is one of the reasons America isn’t great.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: When I download this app I nearly got a virus that could destroy my new iPhone and there were so much ads for very pointless and meaningless things
